response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth more than $1,200,000 to you. Given its unique value and potential, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer reflects my confidence in the product's value and my desire to ensure that such an exceptional item finds its way into the hands of someone who appreciates it fully.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions you might have and to facilitate a smooth transaction.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
